object.name: COSMOS 1833 Satellite details 1987-027A NORAD 17589
object.information: Cosmos 1833 was a Soviet ELINT (Electronic and Signals Intelligence) satellite. Based on the first generation Tselina ELINT, TSNII-KS at the beginning of the 1970's developed the specifications for an improved model with increased frequency range and on-board method of determining the position of fixed transmitters.

link.title: This article uses material from AFSPC
